cmput301w14t13.project.services
Class DataStorageService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      cmput301w14t13.project.services.DataStorageService

public class DataStorageService
extends Service

Responsible for running all tasks, such as posting to server, grabbing from server, and editing objects in the server Used Whenever online and Creating new Topics or Comments to push them to server or for editing comments or Topics to push the changes to server

Author:
nsd
